title: Mass of Al to produce 0.50 mol H2 at 25C and 1atm

content.prompt:
2 Al(s) + 6 HCl(aq) → 2 AlCl3(aq) + 3 H2(g)

According to the reaction represented above, about how many grams of aluminum (atomic mass 27 g) are necessary to produce 0.50 mol of hydrogen gas at 25ºC and 1.00 atm?

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
